courses

Class Course

  • java.lang.Object
    • courses.Course

  • public class Course
extends java.lang.Object
    This entity class holds information of a course.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Course(java.lang.String courseCode, java.lang.String courseName)
      Constructor for course that initialises the course's code and name based on the arguments passed in, and initialises lessons, lessonTypes, registrations and componentWeightageList to new ArrayLists.
      Course(java.lang.String courseCode, java.lang.String courseName, FacultyMember courseCoordinator)
      Constructor for course that initialises the course's code, name and coordinator based on the arguments passed in, and initialises lessons, lessonTypes, registrations and componentWeightageList to new ArrayLists.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addComponentWeightage(ComponentWeightage newComponent)
      This method adds a new ComponentWeightage passed in as argument to componentWeightageList.
      void addLesson(Lesson lesson)
      This method adds a Lesson passed in as argument to lessons (ArrayList of Lesson).
      void addStudentRegistration(Registration newRegistration)
      This method adds a registration passed in as argument to registrations (ArrayList of Registration).
      boolean checkLessonTypeExists(java.lang.String lessonType)
      This method checks if this Course has a particular Lesson type, passed in as parameter (as A String)
      boolean checkStudentRegistered(java.lang.String studentID)
      This method checks if a student is registered for this Course, by checking if the the Student ID passed in matches any of the Student ID's registered for this Course.
      void clearComponentsWeightage()
      This method sets componentWeightageList to an empty ArrayList.
      void dropStudentRegistration(Registration Registration)
      This method removes the target registration from registrations (ArrayList of Registration).

      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getLessonTypes() 
      java.lang.String getName()
      Getter for course name.
      java.util.ArrayList<Registration> getRegistrations()
      Getter for registrations for this course.
      void printAllStudents(java.lang.String lessonType)
      This method makes use of the ConsoleDisplay class to display all Students registered for this Course, grouped by the Lesson type passed in as argument.
      void printLessonsByType(java.lang.String lessonType)
      This method makes use of the ConsoleDisplay class to display this Course's Lessons on the console, grouped by Lesson type.
      void printLessonsByTypeWithVacancy(java.lang.String lessonType)
      This method makes use of the ConsoleDisplay class to display this Course's Lessons, along with their respective vacancies, on the console, grouped by Lesson type.
      void printStudentsInSpecificLesson(int lessonID)
      This method makes use of the ConsoleDisplay class to display Students registered for a Lesson of a particular Lesson ID, that is passed in as argument.

      Setter for course coordinator.

      Setter for course code.

        public Lesson getLesson(int lessonID)

      • checkStudentRegistered

        public boolean checkStudentRegistered(java.lang.String studentID)
        This method checks if a student is registered for this Course, by checking if the the Student ID passed in matches any of the Student ID's registered for this Course.
        Parameters:
        studentID -
        Returns:
        true if Student with target ID is registered for this Course, and false otherwise

        Parameters:
        lessonType -
        Returns:
        true if Lesson type matches a Lesson type in Course, and false otherwise
